Company: Rogers PLC

Job Title: Tech Support / Field Engineer / Customer Lab Support

About Us:
Rogers PLC is a leading technology solutions provider dedicated to delivering innovative products and exceptional customer experiences. We value the richness that diversity brings to our organization and strive to create an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Tech Support / Field Engineer / Customer Lab Support to join our team. As a customer-facing representative, you will be responsible for providing technical support, installing, and maintaining our products at customer sites. You will also collaborate with our internal teams to resolve complex technical issues and develop solutions to improve customer satisfaction.

Responsibilities:
- Provide on-site technical support to customers, resolving issues efficiently and effectively
- Install, configure, and maintain our products at customer sites
- Collaborate with internal teams to troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues
- Develop and implement solutions to improve customer satisfaction and loyalty
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with excellent communication abilities

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
- 2+ years of experience in technical support, field engineering, or a related role
- Strong knowledge of computer systems, networks, and telecommunications
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, prioritizing multiple tasks and deadlines
- Fluency in English; knowledge of other languages is an asset

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
